item.description:
Is there a Blockchain service enabling to record a bet between two persons and execute bitcoin payment based on the result of the bet (ex...

A fairy tale love story (that took almost 19 years to happen) Autumn, 1990. I had just turned five years old. We moved to a new home in another city because my dad had switched jobs. A girl lived next door. She was my age and we attended the same primary school.

item.title: PayPal Competes With Bitcoin For Marketshare Among Indian Freelancers
item.description:
PayPal Competes With Bitcoin For Marketshare Among Indian Freelancers

Financial uncertainty is the last thing freelancers want to worry about these days. With PayPal.me, money is never guaranteed to be yours, regardless of where it comes from. For freelancers, the primary objective is to receive funds on time, and in a convenient manner.

item.title: Stock Up on Bitcoin! US Economy Can Enter Another Recession Soon
item.description:
Stock Up on Bitcoin! US Economy Can Enter Another Recession Soon

The US economy could be headed for another recession soon. Barely seven years after the last great recession, several economic indicators point to a renewed downturn possible in the near future. According to a report by CNBC, investment is down across the board, including specifically in farm machinery, while transportation sales have stalled.

item.title: Fed Explores Radical New Financial Engineering Tools
item.description:
Fed Explores Radical New Financial Engineering Tools

Central banking is "in a brave new world," said a Fed representative as the institution considers both old and radical new tools to drive the US economy in the coming decades. Also read: Can the Federal Reserve Really Save the US Economy?

item.title: How a $64M hack changed the fate of Ethereum, Bitcoin's closest competitor
item.description:
How a $64M hack changed the fate of Ethereum, Bitcoin's closest competitor

Picture this: A thief steals millions of dollars by hacking into an investment fund, and the whole theft is undone with a simple software update. That is, in effect, what happened recently at Ethereum, an upstart digital currency platform second only to Bitcoin in dollar value.

item.title: Blockchain Projects Gear up for the Biggest Blockchain Competition of the Year
item.description:
Blockchain Projects Gear up for the Biggest Blockchain Competition of the Year

The blockchain ecosystem is to be on display in about three weeks during the International Blockchain Week when the blockchain world is expected to descend on Shanghai for one of the biggest event of the year, held by Wanxiang Blockchain Labs, where leading blockchain developers, entrepreneurs, visionaries, CEOs and directors of global companies are to present.

item.title: Contactless Payments in 2016 Surpass The 2015 UK Volume
item.description:
Contactless Payments in 2016 Surpass The 2015 UK Volume

Contactless payments are one of those trends which may or may not become a big thing. Just last year, things were not looking overly positive, despite some growth in most countries around the world. The year 2016 is looking very promising, as the number of contactless payments, this year surpassed the total 2015 volume already.

item.title: Steemit and Ethereum Classic Fad Can Be Over As Newcomers Enter Scene
item.description:
Steemit and Ethereum Classic Fad Can Be Over As Newcomers Enter Scene

Is time running out for Ethereum Classic and Steemit? The two top-six cryptocurrencies come from very different origins, with Steemit being a deliberately engineered blockchain-based social network, while Ethereum Classic was an unplanned fork of Ethereum created after the DAO hack.

item.title: Best Places to Bet Bitcoins on Trump and Hillary
item.description:
Best Places to Bet Bitcoins on Trump and Hillary

It's election season and now it's time to get active: betting on the 2016 Presidential election in bitcoins is a thing! It's going to be a wild one, so buckle up. There are still numerous events forthcoming before the election on November 7. Things could change.
